mcq.statement: Which educational institution was established in Aligarh in 1875 by Sir Syed Ahmed Khan?
mcq.one_liner: Sir Syed Ahmed Khan established the **MAO (Muhammadan Anglo-Oriental) High School** in Aligarh in 1875.
